mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (pproduct, pprice, ocount, osum, ono) VALUE (#{pproduct}, #{pprice}, #{ocount}, #{osum}, #{ono});
mapper.update: update orderr set osuju = '수주 확인' where ono = #{ono}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM connection WHERE cname LIKE concat('%', #{cname} ,'%');
select ono from orderr where pcount = #{pcount} and osuju="수주 대기" and cname = #{cname} order by ono desc limit 1;
